Class JavaPlatform

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qcri.rheem.core.platform.Platform
      • org.qcri.rheem.java.JavaPlatform

  • public class JavaPlatform
extends Platform
    Platform for a single JVM executor based on the java.util.stream library.
